channel.title: Snow
channel.description: Hey i have just got this phonescape source. I have just started to code it. The snow as you can see lags server. When i restart server snow goes away but it just turns back on. How can i get rid of the snow? please tell me here is picture [img]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/6650/snowog4.png[/img]
